pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyschlagePython 3 library for interacting with Schlage Encode WiFi locks.*Note that this project has no official relationship with Schlage or Allegion. Use at your own risk.*## Usage```pythonfrom pyschlage import Auth, Schlage# Create a Schlage object and authenticate with your credentials.s = Schlage(Auth("username", "password"))# List the locks attached to your account.locks = s.locks()# Print the name of the first lockprint(locks[0].name)"My lock"# Lock the first lock.lock[0].lock()```## DocumentationAPI reference can be found on [Read the Docs](https://pyschlage.readthedocs.io)
